Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\lifecycle\manager.go:37:10: string `healthy` has 3 occurrences, but such constant `HealthStatusHealthy` already exists (goconst)
internal\lifecycle\operations.go:619:41: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\lifecycle\deployment.go:270:52: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\lifecycle\health.go:484:55: unused-parameter: parameter 'r' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
